column1: short ball rearing into the arm pit, he fends with the gloves, knocking it behind square
short into the ribs, he's back and working this with a vertical bat through forward square
pulled beautifully behind square! Chest high leg stump line, he swivelled with ease to get it behind square
back of a length, fourth stump, he's squared up, defending to point
top edge over the keeper! A cracking bouncer, he tried to pull, it got him very quickly, it came off the top edge and flew over McDermott and away for four
short ball, head high, he pulls from low to high, it goes in the air towards fine leg but it's short of the man on the rope
back of a length, nipping back, it hits the back thigh pad, they appeal for lbw but it was too high
advances and smashes it back over the bowler's head! He skipped down the track and moved leg side to turn a length ball into a volley, he thrashed it flat and straight over the umpire
back of a length, nipping back and takes him on the thigh guard
advances and lofts over mid on! Again he skipped down to the length ball and he lifted high and handsome over mid on. Only just landed shy of a six
good length, top of off, he skips out and moves off side to push this on the up to mid on
back of a length, fifth stump, he steps forward and tries to work to the onside but gets it back to the bowler
slower ball, fuller length, Roy adjusts and defends with soft hands into the off side for a single
beaten by a nice outswinger. Good length shaping away and he prods and misses
slices this outswinger deliberately wide of short third man! Lovely shot. Fuller outswinger, shaping away, he used his hands to open the face of the bat and guide it past short third man
good length, top of off, he pushes to mid on

Given lbw! Roy thinks he got an inside edge. If he didn't hit it, it was plumb. Full and straight, no swing and Roy was caught on the crease, he wiped across the line and got hit on the front pad and then back pad. Not sure if there was an inside edge. Roy was disappointed. But if he didn't hit it, he has nothing to complain about
back of a length outside off, he drives on the up to cover point
good length, top of middle, he's squared up and gets a thick leading edge to point
charge and heaves a thick inside edge behind square! He advanced and got a length ball and swung wildly, heaving it behind square and it beat the sweeper
good length, he pushes on the up straight of mid off
charges and hammers it flat over straight mid off! No fear from Munro. On the charge first up and he got it in the slot. Terrific shot to smash it straight of mid off
good length, top of off, he defends from the crease trying to get forward
good length, he's hit on the pad, Hurricanes appeal but it pitched way outside leg
shorter length, he's back and forcing this to long on
tossed up slower outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover-point
slog sweep into the second tier at square leg! Tossed up in the slot, the step hit zone, he got down on one knee and flushed it long over square leg
tossed up outside off, he defends on the front foot
shorter length, off break, he's back and working this through forward square
bowled off an inside edge! Tossed up slower outside off, Munro gave himself room to square drive on the up, he gets a thin inside edge and drags it onto off stump! Jacks gets his first BBL wicket
short drag down launched into the second tier! Too short first up, a long hop, he was back and had plenty of time to hit it miles over square leg
wrong un on leg, he's back and working this through forward square
full outside off, he reaches out and works this through midwicket

pulled straight to Malan at deep square! Livingstone got another short long hop, he tried to hit this into the upper deck again and mis hit it, dragging it flat to deep backward square and it's a simple catch for Malan
huge appeal for lbw first up, a wrong un maybe spinning too far down leg. He just plonked on the front foot through and provided a good target for Lamichhane to hit
shorter wrong un, he's back and working to midwicket
short ball on off, he swivels and pulls this neatly through square leg
back of a length, top of off, he's hit high on the back pad but it was too high
good length, top of off, he stands up and defends to mid on
missed by Ellis at deep square! Short ball, Marsh rocked back and thumped it flat and hard to Ellis on the rope, he jumped up but it burst straight through his hands for six
full on leg, it comes off the pad and runs fine for two leg byes
good length, top of off, he defends from the crease
shorter outside off, he pushes off the back foot to long off
flatter on leg, he's back and working through square leg
wrong un, shorter in leg, he's back and working this off the pads through square leg
faster leg break, turning down leg, it hits the pad

Given lbw! Marsh plonked the front pad forward again and Lamichhane hit the front shin with a turning wrong un. Marsh didn't pick it and the umpire gave him out. It was turning a fair way. Would not be surprised if this was missing leg. Maybe just clipping.
full wrong un, he pushes this back past the bowler slowly and they run really well to pinch two as Handscomb comes off the rope. Inglis was in trouble if the throw wasn't wide
slower ball outside off, he defends with soft hands, running it off the face of the bat to third man
good length, top of off, he defends from the crease to mid on for a single
back of a length outside off, he sits back and glides this to third man
full yorker on off, he's sitting right back, pushing to mid on
glanced fine! Too full and too straight, Inglis glanced it with ease away to the fine leg rope
back of a length outside off, he's back and running this fine of third man with a touch of class for a couple
faster top spinner, he punches back to the bowler
stock ball turning into the right hander, hits high on the pad but was going well down
shorter outside off, he's back and forcing this to deep point
dropped return catch! Tough chance. Inglis advanced, got a leading edge back to Short's left and diving at full stretch it didn't stick in the left hand
shorter outside off, he's back and cutting to point
wrong un on off, he's forward and unsure of the wrong un, but he defends
tossed up outside off, he advances and drives nicely straight of long on for two
leg break on off, he chips this in the air over the bowler's head to straight long off for one
leg break outside off, he drives firmly to deep cover
wrong un on middle, he's back and working this to deep forward square
top spinner outside off, he's back and forcing this to long on
full and wide, he square drives to deep point
full on leg, he works this to deep midwicket
shorter on leg, he pulls to deep midwicket
slog sweep over deep square! Too full, a wrong un on leg, he got down on one knee and lifted it high over square leg
out of the front of the hand, he works this off his pads through midwicket for a couple
good length, wrong un, he went back and pushed it through cover-point
full outside leg, he glances this to short fine
fuller on off, he defends on the front foot
quicker and shorter, he's hurried on the back foot
carved in the air just wide of cover! Full and wide and he pinned the ears back and just got it wide of the man diving at cover
quicker on off, he defends on the front foot
full and wide of off, he square drives on the up
quicker leg break on leg, he's back and working this to deep midwicket
shorter wrong un outside off and it shoots low under the bat
slog sweep in the air but short of the man on the rope
full outside off, he slog sweeps and drags it along the ground to deep midwicket
full on leg, too full to sweep, he drags it to short fine

clean bowled! A horrible swipe across the line. It was a stock ball, not a wrong un, Turner picked the wrong un and got down on one knee to launch over deep midwicket and it spun through the gate and crashed into middle!
full on leg, he clips this firmly to deep midwicket
good length outside off, he pushed forward and works this to the circle at mid on but the man is back so they run well for two
glanced fine of long leg! Full but too straight, angled down leg, he glanced it with ease and long leg is quite square.
good length, top of off, he works this through forward square to the gap for two
slower ball, on off, he picks it late and defends from the crease
fuller, angled into off, he's worked this off the front foot to deep square
angled into leg, he works this between the two sweepers at forward square and deep midwicket and they pinch two
back of a length on middle, he's back and tucking this to deep forward square
back of a length, he backs away and carves this flat to deep point
back of a length on off, he defends off the back foot to point
flicked over fine leg! Brilliant shot. It was angled down leg, but he was so quick with his hands to get under it and flip it over the fine leg fence
thick edge late cutting! He was trying to run this shorter slower ball to third man but he got a thick edge and it ran away quickly to the rope
slower ball outside off, he dabs this to short third man
full wide outswinger, he mistimes a drive off the toe of the bat to cover-point
Given lbw! Ellis speared this straight at middle and leg, Hardie stepped across his stumps trying to work to leg, he missed and got hit plumb infront of middle and leg. That was a simple decision
full and wide of off, he gets a thick inside behind square trying to drive through point
full and wide, he square drives inside out to the sweeper at deep backward point
full outside off, he drives to mid off on the circle

steps outside off and paddles this over wide short fine leg! Skilful way to bring up a good half-century. He picked the wide yorker, moved late, got it on the full and flipped it over the man in the circle
short slower ball, he mistimes a pull shot to deep forward square
full, speared into middle, he jams this out to mid off
short slower ball outside off, he swings hard but misses
flicked over straight midwicket with the bottom hand! Full on off, an attempted yorker but it was a half volley and he used the bottom hand skilfully to get it over midwicket
short wide slower ball, he cuts firmly through point, Ellis is diving on the rope but he might have brushed it as he tried to make the save! He has. It's four.
pulled flat over square leg! Short ball just sat up at chest height and he hammers this powerfully over square leg. Superb shot
reverse scoop nearly flies for six! Are you kidding!? Cracking shot. Low full toss on leg, he moves leg side, angles the bat and reverse scoops it over short third man!
full and wide, he carves this to deep point
he backs away, Meredith follows with a low full toss and Richardson misses out as it goes between bat and pad to the keeper
steps outside off this time as it's speared down leg for a wide
backs away, quick bouncer, he swings and misses
full toss flicked high over fine leg! He stepped outside off again, got a knee high full toss down leg, he flicked it high over fine leg and all the way over the fence
backs away and Meredith smartly fires full and wide of off

bowled him with a superb slower ball! Cleverly bowled. Disguised it well, Inglis backed away to carve a normal speed delivery but didn't pick the slower ball and it beat him and crashed into middle and off
low full toss, he drives to mid off
back of a length wide of off, he cuts to deep point, mistiming it enough that they can sprint back for two
drilled past cover! Fuller outside off, he was sitting back and threw his weight and his bat through the line and cracked it wide of long off and David couldn't haul it in
clean bowled! Full and straight on middle, he swung across the line trying to heave it over midwicket but it was too quick and crashed into middle
full on off, he mistimes to long on, they have to try for two, Handscomb throws to the striker's end where Behrendorff is struggling but the throw hits him and he gets home safe
full outside off, he drives firmly to mid off
nearly chops on trying to force on the up through the off side. The thick edge went past off stump to fine leg for two
back of a length on middle, he's back and working this to midwicket
short ball, climbing outside off, he's hurried mistiming a pull shot to mid on
glorious cover drive on the up! Not too full but it was wide and he stood tall and cracked this on the up to the right of cover

leading edge balloons back to the bowler! Back of a length on leg, it might have just held in the surface, Wade pushed out it front of his body and was surprised by the way it held up, got a leading edge and it just lobbed back to Richardson
full on leg, he clips this powerfully to deep midwicket wide of the man for a couple
good length on off, he defends to cover
full on off, he drives firmly to mid on
back of a length on off, he's back and working behind square to the man in the deep
good length, not much shape, he pushes firmly to cover
full on leg, he clips this firmly to midwicket
full and angled into leg stump, he glances this fine leg
good length, fourth stump, he defends on the front foot to cover-point
short, angled down leg, he tries to pull but misses. It's called wide
good length, outside off, he pushes firmly on the up to mid off

towering sky ball well taken by Turner at cover! A length ball, McDermott advanced and tried to loft down the ground, he got under it and hit it straight up, if the roof wasn't open it might have hit the roof, Turner had to sit under it and called everyone out, it drifted late but he took the catch well
thick edge skews just wide of short third man! Slower ball wide of off, he drives hard and gets a thick edge but it flies safely wide of the man at short third man
an appeal for caught down the leg side but it's given not out. It came off thigh pad
good length, fourth stump, he sits back and runs this to third man
nearly bowled him! Good length tailing in, he tried to launch over mid on, it went through the gate, flicked his pants and just went over off stump
good length outside off, he mistimes to point
walks at a slower ball, he drags it with the bottom hand wide of midwicket into the gap for two
good length off stump, he pushes on the up to mid on
shorter on the hip, he pulls off the hip with control to deep square leg
swept hard behind square! Full and drifting down leg, he goes with the angle and ropes it hard behind square
short and wide and cut through cover-point! Tye didn't see it on the rope! He didn't pick it up off the bat and was slow to move and it went for four
drifting down leg, it hits the pad and rolls into the off side
full on leg, he whips to deep forward square
good length off break, he stands up and drives to cover
tossed up, he drives in the air past the bowler to long off
good length, fourth stump, he drives on the up to deep point
slower ball off cutter, he drives on the up to long on
back of a length, he tries to flick over the leg side, it comes off the back thigh to short third man
short ball, he swivels and pulls down forward of square to the man in the deep
holes out to deep cover-point! Full outside off, he leans back and slices a drive in the air straight to Munro at deep point, looking straight into the sun but he takes the catch well
cut neatly wide of third man! Short and wide, he gives room and cuts very nicely with superb timing to get it to the rope
cracking cover drive! Floating half volley first ball and Short cashes in, crunching it past cover and straight of the sweeper
short into the ribs, he swivels and pulls behind square to the sweeper
good length, top of off, on middle, he sits back and defends to mid on
full slower ball, he picked it and lofts this over mid on, he didn't time it but he gets a couple
bouncer, way too high and called wide
fuller on middle, he gives room and drives to cover, a misfield allows one
good length outside off, he mistimes on the up to mid off
shorter leg break, he's back and cutting to deep point
shorter wrong un, he's back and pulling to deep square
leg break, angled into leg, he's back and working to deep square
faster wrong un, he tries to cut, misses and it wasn't far from off stump
flatter outside off, he's back and forcing to long off
full outside off, he sweeps but is taken on the pad, they appeal but it's outside the line
fired into off, good length, he mistimes to cover
darted into leg, he clips this off his pads through forward square
slog sweep over deep forward square! Full in the slot, he cleared the front leg and struck it purely over the fence. Roy has to climb the fence to fetch it
darted outside off, he's back and cutting to deep point
fuller outside off, he drives to long off
another slog sweep into the gap between deep midwicket and long on! Full outside off, again, he identified the length early and got down on one knee to hammer it into the gap, one bounce four
shorter outside off, he's back and forcing this to deep cover
tossed up outside off, he advances and drives to long off
shorter on off, he's back and punching this to long off
he advances to a leg break and pushes to cover
tossed up outside off, he slog sweeps hard and flat but short of the man in the deep
short on middle, he's back and pulling to deep square
full yorker speared into leg, he gets hit on the foot and it rolls fine
short slower ball and he cleverly pulls this over short fine! He controlled the bounce well and placed it in the gap
Cut over backward point! Short outside off, he gives himself room and lifts it up and over backward point

clean bowled! Handscomb is kicking himself. Brilliant slower ball from Richardson, disguised to well, Handscomb was looking for normal pace and tried to loft over wide mid on, he missed and Richardson hit. Middle and off were splayed.
back of a length, top of off, he's squared up defending to midwicket
carved over backward point! Full on off, he backward away and swung hard, slicing it high over backward point and it carried over the rope!
full on leg, he jams this out to mid on
back of a length, angled into the thigh pad, it comes off thigh pad and rolls into the off side
full and speared into leg, he whips this behind square for a couple
top edge just over Inglis! Short ball on middle, he backed away to cut up and over point, gets a thick top edge and it flew too high for Inglis
full on leg, he miscues this dragging it to deep midwicket
launched over forward square! Towering blow! Attempted yorker, Jacks sat deep in his crease and Tye missed his length, Jacks lifted it way back over forward square into the crowd
full outside off, he drives firmly to long off
cutter outside off, he pushes on the up to point
back of a length into off, he stands tall and drives to long on
holes out to deep backward square! Slower ball on leg, Short was through the shot and ended up dragging it behind square and hit it straight to Richardson in the deep. He took the catch easily
good length, wide of off, he square drives on the up to deep point
slower ball, angled into the pads, he can't get and bat on it but they pinch a leg bye
leg break on middle, he defends on the front foot
fuller on leg, he stays leg side and pushes to cover
slider outside off, he tries to cut and misses
shorter leg break, he's back and cutting firmly to deep cover-point
looped full on off, he drives firmly to long off
shorter on middle, he's back and giving room to punch this through cover-point

appeal for a stumping. The TV umpire is called in. Full and drifting outside leg, he stays leg side and tries to loft down the ground, misses, Inglis takes and whips the bails off and is convinced Jacks lifted his foot but he never did. Not out
smoked over deep midwicket! Drifted into leg, he was down the track and lofted against the turn and he got all of it! Sensational strike

holes out to long off! Hardie nearly made a mess of it at long off but he held on well. Tossed up again, Jacks was down the track to loft straight but he got under it, Hardie came in off the rope and then had to back track and take the catch above his head. But he did well
short and wide, he hammers a cut to deep point
tossed outside off, he pushes to backward point, Ellis is late to go and is nearly run out! If Richardson's underarm at the non striker's hit, it would have been out!
short outside off, he's back and cutting to deep point

slog sweep high over deep midwicket into the vacant second tier! A step hit in the slot and he launched it! Incredible strike. That part of the stand is locked off to spectators for Covid reasons. They have to bring out a new ball.
floating leg break wide of off, he leaves this for a wide
drifting into leg, he's tucking this off the pads to deep forward square
full on off, he drives to long on
wrong un on off, he tries to slog sweep, but mistimes it to deep midwicket
full on middle, he drives to long on
pulled high over square leg! Fractionally short on leg, he waited well and pulled high over the fence! Brilliant shot
full outside off, he tries to loft down the ground, gets a thick inside onto pad and it rolls away for one
full on leg, he drills a drive flat and hard to long on

Ellis nearly run out again! Short slower ball, he gets an inside edge onto body, it drops down, David calls him through, Ellis is slow to go, Tye fields in his follow through, swivels and shies at the non striker's but misses. Ellis was out if he hit
bouncer far too high and called wide
yorker into leg, he jams this out to point
shovelled up and over wide mid off! Mid off is up. Ellis charged the full ball and moved leg side using the bottom hand to lift it over mid off

picks out Hardie at mid off! This was fuller, speared into leg stump, Ellis sat back and stayed leg side, but he was cramped trying to loft over mid off again, he hit it flat to Hardie's right on the circle and he held the catch well
wide yorker is too wide
full outside off, he mistimes a swiped drive, dragging it to long on and David calls 'no'. He turns down the single
yorker, speared into off, he squeezes this out to deep backward point and David sends Boland back
he walks down to a fuller ball outside off but he mistimes it to cover
wide yorker, he can't get under it, drilling it along the ground to deep cover-point. They run this time
wide yorker, nearly outside the guideline but Boland backed away so it's called a far delivery
lofted high and wide of long off but they don't take the single as the fielder comes around
full and wide of off and he beats him with pace
low full toss, he carves this along the ground to long off and they don't run
launched over cover! Finally Richardson misses his length outside off and David got him. Opened the chest and lifted it with brute force over the fence.
low full toss, he breaks his bat driving this to long off and they don't run

high full toss mishit down the throat of deep cover. Is it a no-ball for above waist high or is it out? David stands his grand. The umpires sent it to the TV umpire. It's line ball. David has lowered into the shot and the third umpire has deemed it's a legal delivery! He's out. He mis hit it high to deep cover and Munro took the catch easily
full on middle, he whips this from middle stump through square leg to the sweeper
low full toss outside off, he mistimes a drive to long off
wide yorker, well bowled, he misses trying to carve it through point
slower ball outside off, Boland swings hard but misses
slower ball but too wide of off
he charges and backs away, Hardie follows with a yorker and he jams it towards mid on
good length outside off, he swipes this across the line to long on
full toss glanced fine for four! A poor delivery to finish and Boland picks up a boundary
